q: Supreme excellence consists of breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.
h:
“Supreme excellence consists of breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.” —
Sun Tzu

q: Strive for excellence, not perfection, because we don't live in a perfect world.
h:
“Strive for excellence, not perfection, because we don't live in a perfect world.” —
Joyce Meyer

q: Prefer to be defeated in the presence of the wise than to excel among fools.
h:
“Prefer to be defeated in the presence of the wise than to excel among fools.” —
Dogen

q: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
h:
“Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude. ” —
Ralph Marston

q: Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.
h:
“Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.” —
Colin Powell

q: If you focus on success, you'll have stress. But if you pursue excellence, success will be guaranteed.
h:
“If you focus on success, you'll have stress. But if you pursue excellence, success will be guaranteed.” —
Deepak Chopra

q: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
h:
“Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.” —
Vince Lombardi

q: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters.
h:
“If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters.” —
Colin Powell

q: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
h:
“We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.” —
Aristotle
